sentences.sContent: If you try any monkey tricks with me, I will shoot you right away, and your family can come and collect your body in the mortuary.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you try any monkey tricks with me, I will shoot you right away, and your family can come and collect your body in the mortuary.
sentences.sCn: 如果你们谁敢跟我耍花样，我现在就枪毙了他，他的家人可以等着到太平间里认领他的尸体。

sentences.sContent: Her eyes were shut. If it was not for the fact you could see her breathing — and the odd flutter of her eyelid — she could indeed have been a body in a ­mortuary.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her eyes were shut. If it was not for the fact you could see her breathing — and the odd flutter of her eyelid — she could indeed have been a body in a ­mortuary.
sentences.sCn: 她的眼睛是闭着的（译注：可能这位记者的眼睛才是闭着的），如果你没有注意到她的呼吸和她眼睑的振颤，她简直就像一具放在太平间里的死尸。

trans.tranOther: a building or room, for example in a hospital, where dead bodies are kept before they are buried or  cremate d
